member.name: CHANGER_SET_POSITION
member.summary: Contains information needed by theIOCTL_CHANGER_SET_POSITION control code to set the changer's robotic transport mechanism to the specified element address.

member.name: CHANGER_SET_POSITION.Transport
member.summary: A structure that indicates the transport to be moved. The ElementType member must be ChangerTransport.

member.name: CHANGER_SET_POSITION.Destination
member.summary: A structure that indicates the final destination of the transport. The ElementType member must be one of the following values: ChangerSlot, ChangerDrive, or ChangerIEPort.

member.name: CHANGER_SET_POSITION.Flip
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the media currently carried by Transport should be flipped. Otherwise, it should not. This member is valid only if the Features0 member of the structure is CHANGER_MEDIUM_FLIP.
